channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Informix Dynamic Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Informix Dynamic Server

item.title: CVE-2021-20515|2024-08-03T17:45:44.353Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server 14.10 is vulnerable to a stack based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local privileged user could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service condition. IBM X-Force ID: 198366.
